title: Bit Toggle Function
description:
BIT_TOGGLE_B inverts a specifed bit at IN.
BIT_TOGGLE_W(2#0000_1111, 2) = 2#0000_1011
BIT_TOGGLE_W(2#0000_1111, 7) = 2#1000_1111
name: BIT_TOGGLE_B

input.name: IN
input.description: The input BYTE value whose bit is to be toggled.

input.name: POS
input.description: The position of the bit to be toggled, where 0 represents the least significant bit.

return_value.description: The resulting BYTE value after toggling the specified bit.
